content: in this legal case a court in latina has made a decision after a 9year process the court awarded compensation to the claimant for court fees and professional fees the court determined that a building belonged exclusively to the exhusband and did not constitute community property the court also rejected the claimants request for the division of other joint properties the court assigned ownership of the building to the exhusband and ownership of the land to the claimant the court ordered the exhusband to pay a settlement amount to the claimant both parties will share the costs of the proceedings the court also ordered the payment of fees and costs related to the expert report and the transcription of the judgment the ruling was made on september 23 2018
